metadata.synopsis: Narrator AD that is played after the combat with Raphael is finished. It will be played only if there's no one else to start the dialogue with

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *No more contracts, no more debts. The master of the house has been put to sleep, for good.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *No more Devils, no more debts. With its master gone, the house is nothing more now than an empty carcass.*

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *The Devil was defeated in his own home. Now Hope can prevail once more.*
